name: Let me fix that for you, Youtube
description:
Places the comment section between the video and the video suggestion column, so you scroll and read comments while looking at the video. Also removes promos, teasers, posts from creators, and recommended filter.

There is a slight bug with the width of the video timestamp slider on certain resolutions. Sorry about that.
additional_info: 2022-08-13 First uploaded. 2022-09-105 Youtube did some restyling that I fixed. Also removed the blurred image under the player.
